title: 关于外国网址账号的注册
author: 幻影~~~
txt_content:
https://www.spigotmc.org/register/register
这个网址请问怎么注册？
总显示
Please correct the following errors:[color=rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8)]You did not complete the CAPTCHA verification properly. Please try again.

而
Verification:
这里什么也没有诶？？？
求大佬解疑！！！！
